title: stake World Bank procurement training

title: PM Anwar condemns Islamabad mosque bombing, extends condolences to Pakistan
desc: PETALING JAYA: Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim has condemned the bombing at a mosque in Islamabad during Friday (Feb 6) prayers, describing it as an affront to basic humanity and extending Malaysia's condolences to the victims and their families.
